Uses of Class
com.samskivert.depot.Query

  • Packages that use Query 
    Package Description
    com.samskivert.depot
    The bulk of the Depot public API.

    • Uses of Query in com.samskivert.depot

      Methods in com.samskivert.depot that return Query 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Query<T> Query.ascending(SQLExpression<?> value)
      Configures an OrderBy clause that ascends on the supplied expression.
      Query<T> Query.cache(DepotRepository.CacheStrategy cache)
      Configures the specified caching policy this query.
      Query<T> Query.cacheBest()
      Configures the use of DepotRepository.CacheStrategy.BEST for this query.
      Query<T> Query.cacheContents()
      Configures the use of DepotRepository.CacheStrategy.CONTENTS for this query.
      Query<T> Query.cacheLongKeys()
      Configures the use of DepotRepository.CacheStrategy.LONG_KEYS for this query.
      Query<T> Query.cacheRecords()
      Configures the use of DepotRepository.CacheStrategy.RECORDS for this query.
      Query<T> Query.cacheShortKeys()
      Configures the use of DepotRepository.CacheStrategy.SHORT_KEYS for this query.
      Query<T> Query.descending(SQLExpression<?> value)
      Configures an OrderBy clause that descends on the supplied expression.
      Query<T> Query.distinct()
      Configures the query to return only distinct rows.
      Query<T> Query.distinct(SQLExpression<?> distinctOn)
      Configures the query to return rows for which the given expression evaluates distinctly.
      Query<T> Query.fieldDef(ColumnExp<?> field, SQLExpression<?> override)
      Adds a FieldDefinition clause.
      Query<T> Query.fieldDef(FieldDefinition fieldDef)
      Adds a FieldDefinition clause.
      Query<T> Query.fieldDef(String field, SQLExpression<?> override)
      Adds a FieldDefinition clause.
      Query<T> Query.fieldDef(String field, String value)
      Adds a FieldDefinition clause.
      Query<T> Query.forUpdate()
      Configures a ForUpdate clause which marks this query as selecting for update.
      <T extends PersistentRecord>
      Query<T>      		 DepotRepository.from(Class<T> type)
      Returns a builder that can be used to construct a query in a fluent style.
      Query<T> Query.groupBy(SQLExpression<?>... exprs)
      Configures a GroupBy clause on the supplied group expressions.
      Query<T> Query.join(Class<? extends PersistentRecord> joinClass, SQLExpression<?> joinCondition)
      Adds a Join clause configured with the join condition.
      Query<T> Query.join(ColumnExp<?> left, ColumnExp<?> right)
      Adds a Join clause configured with the supplied left and right columns.
      Query<T> Query.join(ColumnExp<?> left, ColumnExp<?> right, Join.Type type)
      Adds a Join clause configured with the supplied left and right columns and join type.
      Query<T> Query.join(Join join)
      Configures the query with the supplied Join clause.
      Query<T> Query.limit(int count)
      Configures a Limit clause configured with the supplied count.
      Query<T> Query.limit(int offset, int count)
      Configures a Limit clause configured with the supplied offset and count.
      Query<T> Query.noCache()
      Disables the use of the cache for this query.
      Query<T> Query.orderBy(OrderBy orderBy)
      Configures the query with the supplied OrderBy clause.
      Query<T> Query.override(Class<? extends PersistentRecord> fromClass)
      Configures a FromOverride clause configured with the supplied override class.
      Query<T> Query.override(Class<? extends PersistentRecord> fromClass1, Class<? extends PersistentRecord> fromClass2)
      Configures a FromOverride clause configured with the supplied override classes.
      Query<T> Query.override(FromOverride fromOverride)
      Configures the query with the supplied FromOverride clause.
      Query<T> Query.randomOrder()
      Configures an OrderBy clause configured to randomly order the results.
      <V extends Comparable<? super V>>
      Query<T>      		 Query.where(ColumnExp<V> column, V value)
      Configures a Where clause that selects rows where the supplied column equals the supplied value.
      <V1 extends Comparable<? super V1>,V2 extends Comparable<? super V2>>
      Query<T>      		 Query.where(ColumnExp<V1> index1, V1 value1, ColumnExp<V2> index2, V2 value2)
      Configures a Where clause that selects rows where both supplied columns equal both supplied values.
      Query<T> Query.where(Iterable<? extends SQLExpression<?>> exprs)
      Configures a Where clause that ANDs together all of the supplied expressions.
      Query<T> Query.where(SQLExpression<?>... exprs)
      Configures a Where clause that ANDs together all of the supplied expressions.
      Query<T> Query.where(WhereClause where)
      Configures a Where clause that selects rows where both supplied columns equal both supplied values.
      Query<T> Query.whereTrue()
      Configures a Where clause that matches all rows.
